section.title: What is the model service?
section.para: The model service gives you access to the application model at runtime and allows you to modify it. For example, you can add and remove model elements. It also contains functionality to clone application model snippets which can be added to the application.

section.title: How to access the model service
Cloning elements or snippets
section.para: In the application model you can create Snippet model elements which can be used to create model objects at runtime. It is also possible to copy existing application model elements via the model service.
You can use the cloneElement() and cloneSnippet() methods of the model service to copy an existing element or snippet. The resulting object can be assigned to another model element.
